item.title: Welcome to DATA606!
item.description: Welcome to DATA606! Your instructors will be Dr. Jason Bryer and Dr. Angela Lui. Couple of important notes as you get started: The course syllabus located here: https://spring2022.data606.net/course-overview. We will post all course materials there. Blackboard will be used primarily for submitting assignments. Please read the syllabus carefully! Send us any questions you may still have about the course. Complete this Google Form as soon as possible.
